item.description:
This is another informational and informal meetup to discuss plans for the Montreal Film Festival, August 21-September 1. For new members, please see earlier posts on the Message Board for background info.

And as a Special Bonus...

Since The Edge of Heaven is on the Meetup calendar that night, why not join me for that too? Please state your intention to attend the film in your RSVP. (Tom is aware of this arrangement, but if you want to join the post-film discussion at the restaurant, and if there are openings on that Meetup, please put your RSVP there, too.)

Let's make this trip a good one! See you on the 12th!

Lisa
